comment.author: 69202911@N05
comment._content: About 10:15 P.M., Emil Silvan "Scotty" Scott was killed in the crash of China National Aviation Corporation’s (CNAC’s) last DC-2, #31, shortly after take-off, about 2 km from the Kunming Airdrome on a flight to Chungking. This crash was reported in the New York Times, March 16, 1942. (www.cnac.org)
